trans-unit.source: Thread-Safe Collections
trans-unit.target: 安全執行緒集合

trans-unit.source: Thread-Safe Collections
trans-unit.target: 安全執行緒集合

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Thread-Safe Collections
trans-unit.target: 安全執行緒集合

trans-unit.source: The [System.Collections.Concurrent](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent) namespace includes several collection classes that are both thread-safe and scalable.
trans-unit.target: [System.Collections.Concurrent](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent)命名空間包含數個具備安全執行緒且可擴充的集合類別。

trans-unit.source: Multiple threads can safely and efficiently add or remove items from these collections, without requiring additional synchronization in user code.
trans-unit.target: 多個執行緒可以安全且有效率地新增或移除這些集合中的項目，而不需要利用使用者程式碼進行額外同步處理。

trans-unit.source: When you write new code, use the concurrent collection classes whenever the collection will be writing to multiple threads concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 當您撰寫新的程式碼時，只要集合同時寫入多個執行緒，就使用並行集合類別。

trans-unit.source: If you are only reading from a shared collection, then you can use the classes in the [System.Collections.Generic](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Generic) namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果您僅讀取共用集合，則可以使用 [System.Collections.Generic](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Generic) 命名空間中的類別。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you do not use [System.Collections](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections) collection classes unless you are required to target the .NET Framework 1.1 or earlier runtime.
trans-unit.target: 除非您需要將目標設為 .NET Framework 1.1 或舊版本的執行階段，否則建議您不要使用 [System.Collections](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections) 集合類別。

trans-unit.source: Fine-Grained Locking and Lock-Free Mechanisms
trans-unit.target: 更細緻的鎖定和無鎖定機制

trans-unit.source: Some of the concurrent collection types use lightweight synchronization mechanisms such as [SpinLock](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Threading.SpinLock), [SpinWait](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Threading.SpinWait), [SemaphoreSlim](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Threading.SemaphoreSlim), and [CountdownEvent](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Threading.CountdownEvent).
trans-unit.target: 有些並行集合類型會使用輕量型同步處理機制 (例如 [SpinLock](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Threading.SpinLock)、[SpinWait](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Threading.SpinWait)、[SemaphoreSlim](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Threading.SemaphoreSlim) 和 [CountdownEvent](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Threading.CountdownEvent))。

trans-unit.source: These synchronization types typically use busy spinning for brief periods before they put the thread into a true `Wait` state.
trans-unit.target: 這些同步處理類型一般會先使用短期間的忙碌旋轉，再讓執行緒進入真正 `Wait` 狀態。

trans-unit.source: When wait times are expected to be very short, spinning is far less computationally expensive than waiting, which involves an expensive kernel transition.
trans-unit.target: 預期等候時間很短時，旋轉的費用遠低於等待，這包含昂貴的核心轉換。

trans-unit.source: For collection classes that use spinning, this efficiency means that multiple threads can add and remove items at a very high rate.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用旋轉的集合類別，這個效率表示多個執行緒可以使用極高的速率來新增和移除項目。

trans-unit.source: The [ConcurrentQueue<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentQueue-1) and [ConcurrentStack<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentStack-1) classes do not use locks at all.
trans-unit.target: [ConcurrentQueue<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentQueue-1) 和 [ConcurrentStack<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentStack-1) 類別根本不會使用鎖定。

trans-unit.source: Instead, they rely on Interlocked operations to achieve thread-safety.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它們依賴連鎖作業來達成執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: Because the concurrent collections classes support [ICollection](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.ICollection), they provide implementations for the `IsSynchronized` and `SyncRoot` properties, even though these properties are irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: 因為並行集合類別支援 [ICollection](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.ICollection)，所以會提供 `IsSynchronized` 和 `SyncRoot` 屬性的實作，即使這些屬性無關也是一樣。

trans-unit.source: `IsSynchronized` always returns `false` and `SyncRoot` is always null.
trans-unit.target: `SyncRoot` 一律會傳回 `IsSynchronized`，而 `false` 一律為 null。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the collection types in the [System.Collections.Concurrent](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent) namespace.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出 [System.Collections.Concurrent](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent) 命名空間中的集合類型。

trans-unit.source: Type
trans-unit.target: 類型

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 說明

trans-unit.source: [BlockingCollection<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.BlockingCollection-1)
trans-unit.target: [BlockingCollection<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.BlockingCollection-1)

trans-unit.source: Provides bounding and blocking functionality for any type that implements [IProducerConsumerCollection<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.IProducerConsumerCollection-1).
trans-unit.target: 提供任何可實作 [IProducerConsumerCollection<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.IProducerConsumerCollection-1) 之類型的界限和封鎖功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [BlockingCollection Overview](blockingcollection-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [BlockingCollection 概觀](blockingcollection-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: [ConcurrentBag<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag-1)
trans-unit.target: [ConcurrentBag<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag-1)

trans-unit.source: Thread-safe implementation of an unordered collection of elements.
trans-unit.target: 未排序元素集合的安全執行緒實作。

trans-unit.source: [ConcurrentDictionary<TKey, TValue>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary-2)
trans-unit.target: [ConcurrentDictionary<TKey, TValue>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary-2)

trans-unit.source: Thread-safe implementation of a dictionary of key-value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵/值組字典的安全執行緒實作。

trans-unit.source: [ConcurrentQueue<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentQueue-1)
trans-unit.target: [ConcurrentQueue<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentQueue-1)

trans-unit.source: Thread-safe implementation of a FIFO (first-in, first-out) queue.
trans-unit.target: FIFO (先進先出) 佇列的安全執行緒實作。

trans-unit.source: [ConcurrentStack<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentStack-1)
trans-unit.target: [ConcurrentStack<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentStack-1)

trans-unit.source: Thread-safe implementation of a LIFO (last-in, first-out) stack.
trans-unit.target: LIFO (後進先出) 堆疊的安全執行緒實作。

trans-unit.source: [IProducerConsumerCollection<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.IProducerConsumerCollection-1)
trans-unit.target: [IProducerConsumerCollection<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.IProducerConsumerCollection-1)

trans-unit.source: The interface that a type must implement to be used in a `BlockingCollection`.
trans-unit.target: 類型必須實作以在 `BlockingCollection` 中使用的介面。

trans-unit.source: Thread Synchronization in the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 2.0 Collections
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 1.0 和 2.0 版集合中的執行緒同步處理

trans-unit.source: The collections first introduced in the .NET Framework version 1.0 are found in the [System.Collections](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections) namespace.
trans-unit.target: 集合是在 .NET Framework 1.0 版首次引進，並位在 [System.Collections](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections) 命名空間中。

trans-unit.source: These collections, which include the commonly used [ArrayList](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.ArrayList) and [Hashtable](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Hashtable), provide some thread-safety through the `Synchronized` property, which returns a thread-safe wrapper around the collection.
trans-unit.target: 這些包括常用 [ArrayList](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.ArrayList) 和 [Hashtable](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Hashtable) 的集合透過 `Synchronized` 屬性提供某種安全執行緒，而這個屬性會傳回集合的安全執行緒包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: The wrapper works by locking the entire collection on every add or remove operation.
trans-unit.target: 包裝函式的運作方式是針對每個新增或移除作業鎖定整個集合。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, each thread that is attempting to access the collection must wait for its turn to take the one lock.
trans-unit.target: 因此，嘗試存取集合的每個執行緒都必須等待，直到輪到它取得一個鎖定。

trans-unit.source: This is not scalable and can cause significant performance degradation for large collections.
trans-unit.target: 這無法進行擴充，而且可能會造成大型集合的重大效能下降。

trans-unit.source: Also, the design is not completely protected from race conditions.
trans-unit.target: 此外，設計未完全保護競爭情形。

trans-unit.source: The collection classes first introduced in the .NET Framework version 2.0 are found in the [System.Collections.Generic](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Generic) namespace.
trans-unit.target: 集合類別是在 .NET Framework 2.0 版首次引進，並位在 [System.Collections.Generic](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Generic) 命名空間中。

trans-unit.source: These include [List<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Generic.List-1), [Dictionary<TKey, TValue>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary-2), and so on.
trans-unit.target: 這些包含 [List<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Generic.List-1)、[Dictionary<TKey, TValue>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary-2) 等。

trans-unit.source: These classes provide improved type safety and performance compared to the `System.Collections` classes.
trans-unit.target: 這些類別提供 `System.Collections` 類別的改良類型安全和效能。

trans-unit.source: However, the `System.Collections.Generic` collection classes do not provide any thread synchronization; user code must provide all synchronization when items are added or removed on multiple threads concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 不過，`System.Collections.Generic` 集合類別不會提供任何執行緒同步處理；在多個執行緒上同時新增或移除項目時，使用者程式碼必須提供所有同步處理。

trans-unit.source: We recommend the `System.Collections.Concurrent` collection classes because they provide not only the type safety of the `System.Collections.Generic` collection classes, but also more efficient and more complete thread safety than the `System.Collections` collections provide.
trans-unit.target: 建議使用 `System.Collections.Concurrent` 集合類別，原因是它們不僅提供 `System.Collections.Generic` 集合類別的型別安全，而且效率和安全執行緒也會比 `System.Collections` 集合所提供的效率和安全執行緒更高且完整。

trans-unit.target: 示範在您可以重複使用物件而非持續建立新物件的情況下，如何使用並行資料包改善效能。
